text: nam icchiccirunnenkil a vacanannalilutettanne namavane unnatiyilekk nayikkumayirunnu. pakse, ayal bhumiyeat otticcernn tannistatte pinparrukayanuntayat. atinal ayalute upama oru nayayutetan. ni atine dreahiccal at nakk tukkiyitum. ni atine verute vittalum at nav nittiyitum. nam'mute vacanannale kallamakkiya janattinre udaharanavum itutanne. atinal avarkk ikkathayeann visadikariccukeatukkuka. oruvela avar cinticcenkilea
